## Overview

`pylifemap` is a jupyter widget allowing to visualize taxonomy data on [Lifemap](https://lifemap-ncbi.univ-lyon1.fr).


## Installation and usage

For the moment the package can only be installed from Github:

```sh
pip install git+https://github.com/juba/pylifemap.git
```

[Usage](usage.qmd) gives more detailed usage instructions.


## Credits

- The `iucn` data files in the `data/` directory have been generated from [The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species](https://www.gbif.org/dataset/19491596-35ae-4a91-9a98-85cf505f1bd3) dataset (DOI [10.15468/0qnb58](https://doi.org/10.15468/0qnb58)).
- Visualizations are powered by [Open Layers](https://openlayers.org) and [deck.gl](https://deck.gl).
